mapper.select: SELECT pidx ,pNameKr ,pNameEng ,pBrandKr ,PBrandEng ,pPrice ,pSize ,pColor ,pType ,pFile1 ,pFile2 ,pFile3 ,pFile4 ,pFile5 ,pWrite ,case pGender when 'M' then 'MEN' when 'W' then 'WOMEN' when 'K' then 'KIDS' else 'MEN' end as pGender FROM product WHERE 1=1

SELECT PIDX ,pSaleYn ,pNameKr ,pNameEng ,pBrandKr ,pBrandEng ,pPrice ,pSize ,pColor ,pType ,pFile1 ,pFile2 ,pFile3 ,pFile4 ,pFile5 ,case pGender when 'M' then 'MEN' when 'W' then 'WOMEN' when 'K' then 'KIDS' else 'MEN' end as pGender FROM product WHERE pidx = #{pidx}

SELECT w.widx, p.pidx, m.midx, m.mName, p.pPrice, p.pBrandeng, p.pBrandkr, p.pNamekr, p.pNameEng, p.pFile1, p.pColor, p.pFile1 FROM wish w, product p, member m WHERE w.pidx=p.pidx AND w.midx = m.midx AND w.midx=#{midx} ORDER BY widx
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY pidx DESC LIMIT #{rowStart},15
SELECT pidx, pPrice, pBrandeng, pBrandkr, pNamekr, pColor, pFile1 FROM product WHERE pidx = #{pidx}
